text:
She is usually seen looking glam on red carpets.
But Hollywood actress Kate Hudson was clearly in family mode when she stepped out in Los Angeles on Thursday afternoon.
The blonde actress, 36, was spotted at LAX airport where she cut a trendy and off-duty figure with youngest son Bingham.
Scroll down for video
Mum's the word: Kate Hudson was clearly in family mode when she stepped out in Los Angeles with son Bingham on Thursday afternoon
Clearly off-duty, the daughter of Goldie Hawn and Bill Hudson, looked great in a loose-fitting, checked shirt, which she matched with a pair of stonewash jeans in skinny fit.
Accessorising with a tan leather handbag and designer sunglasses, she also clutched a take-away coffee as she made headway on her journey.
Sexing the look up a little, she added a pair of over-the-knee suede boots, which perfectly anchored her hipster style.
Cool: Clearly off-duty, the daughter of Goldie Hawn and Bill Hudson, looked great in a loose-fitting, checked shirt, which she matched with a pair of stonewash jeans in skinny fit
Holding hands with her youngest son, the youngster looked well-prepared for his journey with a packed rucksack, likely full of toys and games.
Wearing a cute pair of skinny jeans with a navy blue and white jumper, complete with a two-tone baseball hat, he's certainly a naturally cool kid.
Then again, given that his father is Muse's Matt Bellamy, that's not wholly surprising.

Just 48 hours earlier, on Tuesday, Kate discussed her childhood as part of her appearance on Late Night With Seth Meyers.
‘My childhood memories are actually quite visceral,’ Kate, who wore a dazzling low-cut jumpsuit, told host Seth.
‘Like my mom’s skin, one of my first memories was in Ibiza ...lying on my mom’s skin and the feeling of warmth and sunscreen, the smell of sunscreen,’ she reminisced while looking stylish in a glittery green jumpsuit and nude Louboutin stilettos.
Hand-in-hand: The pair had a spring in their step as navigated their way through the temrinal
Fashionable: Accessorising with a tan leather handbag and designer sunglasses, she also clutched a take-away coffee as she made headway on her journey
Despite many appearances under the flashbulbs of Hollywood, Kate said her memories of those early times with her parents were dim.
‘I went to all of them [the premieres] but I don’t really remember any of them,’ she laughed.
Hudson has a 12-year-old son Ryder from her former marriage to singer Chris Robinson and a four-year-old son Bingham with her English musician ex-boyfriend Matt Bellamy.
